attributes.action: require Cabinet Ministers, and those in public leadership, to estimate and disclose the total annual CO2 emissions associated with their activities and lifestyle – their personal* ‘carbon cloud’  (often referred to as a ‘carbon footprint’)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PERSONAL CARBON DISCLOSURE 


Target CO2 savings that are in keeping with the rapid reduction rate required 

Target private emissions* that converge towards a fair and sustainable per capita quota of the planet’s common atmosphere 

Roll out to all positions of leadership in public office

Embrace the All Party Parliamentary Climate Change Group’s current '25/5 campaign' 


NOTES

*The personal carbon cloud comprises (i) ‘private’ and (ii) ‘on official business’ components.  BOTH are to be disclosed. 

Some Ministers must travel extensively.  This is not disputed.  The issue is disclosure.  SEEING WHAT WE ARE DOING.

The 'private' component is that which is affected by lifestyle choices.  Minister’s private lives are a private matter, but GHG pollution is a matter of public interest.  

We believe that PERSONAL CARBON DISCLOSURE will contribute to leadership on the most serious threat ever faced. 


NB Before signing petition be sure to know your OWN carbon cloud.
